articles.title: National Memorial Service Held to Mark 2nd Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
National Memorial Service Held to Mark 2nd Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service was held solemnly in Pyongyang on Tuesday, the second anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there was Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Attending it were leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of organs, enterprises, factories and co-op farms in Pyongyang, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, persons of merit and other people.
					
					 Also present there were overseas Koreans delegations including the delegation of Koreans in Japan and the delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China, overseas Koreans, those related to revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and members of the military attaches corps here and other foreigners.
					
					 All the participants observed a moment's silence in humblest reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a memorial address.
					
					 The life of Kim Jong Il was the one of the great thinker, statesman and brilliant commander who performed unprecedented great feats in the history of the Korean nation and the world history of politics, the speaker said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il comprehensively systematized and developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea with his extraordinary wisdom and energetic ideological and theoretical activities, built the party, state and army of the DPRK into the glorious party, state and army of President Kim Il Sung and achieved the most solid single-minded unity under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 He, cherishing Songun as the steadfast revolutionary creed all his life, built the People's Army into the matchless revolutionary army and put the DPRK on the position of the world's military power, thereby providing a sure guarantee for the eternal prosperity of the nation.
					
					 He led all the fellow countrymen along the road of independent reunification and great national unity, opening up the June 15 era of reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself" and making immortal contributions to defending the peace in Asia and the rest of the world and accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 He was the peerless patriot, great revolutionary and benevolent father who took warm care of the country and its people with ardent loving care and warm feelings all his life.
					
					 He, cherishing in his early years the high aim of glorifying Korea, led the Korean revolution to victory with his iron will and tireless energies for more than half a century from the first days of leading the revolution, while weathering all ordeals which no other human being, revolutionary and leader have ever undergone.
					
					 The tremendous national power was provided and the Korean people could lead a dignified and happy life thanks to the tireless efforts and self-sacrificing dedication of Kim Jong Il who gave ceaseless field guidance despite severe snowstorm and midsummer heat, always going in simple jumper. 
					
					 He led the revolution and construction along the road of one victory after another with his gifted wisdom and through his veteran and tested leadership, ushering in the glorious era of national prosperity and laying an eternal cornerstone for accomplishing the Juche cause.   His immortal revolutionary life and feats will always go down in the history of the country.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a speech to vow loyalty on behalf of the KPA, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, on behalf of the scientists and Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, on behalf of the working class.
					
					 They said:
					
					 Over the past two years the whole country was swept by the strong tide of the best wishes for immortality of Kim Jong Il as the army and people of the DPRK have consolidated the blood ties with him.
					
					 The army and people, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un, waged a sacred struggle arms in arms and shoulder to shoulder with him to translate the idea and desire of Kim Jong Il into realities. They have thus made a leap forward in the revolution and construction, giving fullest play to Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided matchless military power and the unbreakable unity between the army and people, working heart and soul with patriotic will under the uplifted banner of Songun all his life, and thus put the dignity of the country and people on the highest level in the history of the nation. These revolutionary exploits will shed brilliant rays as an eternal treasure of the sun's Korea.
					
					 They renewed their firm determination to provide a firm guarantee for the revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il with arms and work fresh miracles and set new records startling the era in every surging worksite for the building of an economic power and highly civilized socialist nation under the ever-victorious leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Memorial services took place in all provinces, cities (districts) and counties and at industrial complexes on Tuesday on the same occasion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday, the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 He was accompanied by Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Won Hong and other members of the leadership organ of the Central Committee of the WPK in Pyongyang City, officials of the Central Committee of the WPK, leading officers of armed forces organs and officials of ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 Seen standing beside the statues were flags of the WPK and the DPRK and army colors. The guard of honor of the Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-air Forces of the KPA and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards lined up beside them.
					
					 The chief of the guard of honor made a salute to the statues.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Also laid before the statues was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and its Cabinet.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence for him.
					
					 He looked round the hall where the orders Kim Jong Il received are on display, the mourning hall and the halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President 
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of Syria, on December 15.
					 The message said:
					
					 Please accept my regards.
					
					 I send this message to Your Excellency, looking back on the great exploits HE General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed for the country and people on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.
					
					 As Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to the adherence to the revolutionary line for developing the DPRK, he is being praised as an eternal leader.
					
					 We Syrian people are today joining Your Excellency and the friendly Korean people in commemorating the anniversary of demise of HE leader Kim Jong Il and highly appreciating his immortal exploits. 
					
					 We are satisfied with the strong friendly relations between our two friendly countries and peoples.
					
					 We highly appreciate the support Your Excellency extends to our just cause when our country is undergoing difficulties, in particular.
					
					 Sincerely Yours.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- First Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un received a message from G. Zyuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on Dec. 13.
					 The message said that 2 years have elapsed since Kim Jong Il, the recognized leader of the Korean people, passed away.
					
					 It noted that the memory of him is always deeply enshrined by the Korean people and his behests have correctly been implemented through the works for the country and the wellbeing of its people.
					
					 The DPRK continues building socialist society, bolstering up its defence capabilities, it said.
					
					 Successes made by the Korean people represent their reverence for Kim Jong Il, it added.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Niger President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Niger President
 Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Mahamadou Issoufou, president of the Republic of Niger, on Tuesday on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the proclamation of the republic.
					 The message wished the president and people of Niger bigger successes in their work for achieving social progress and economic development, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger by their common efforts.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people from all walks of life and schoolchildren laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and portraits depicting their beaming images across the country on Tuesday, the second anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 An endless stream of masses visited their statues on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Seen before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA). 
					
					 Floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions and units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions, enterprises, industrial establishments, farms, schools, etc. in Pyongyang and bouquets and flowers were placed before the statues.
					
					 Also laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The people made bows to the statues, looking back on the noble revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who devoted himself to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 Floral baskets in the name of KPA units, institutions and enterprises and bouquets and flowers were laid before the statues and portraits at various places in Pyongyang including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Service personnel, people and schoolchildren across the country also visited the statues and portraits to pay respects to them.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Compatriots Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Compatriots Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign diplomats and guests and overseas compatriots staying in the homeland visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday, the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. They included the diplomatic corps and military attaches corps here, family members of Zhang Weihua, anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr in China, and family members of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Bao-zhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state and made bows to him. 
					
					 They looked round the hall where orders he received are on display and the halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him during his field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of his life.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Remembrance Concert Given
articles.content:
Remembrance Concert Given
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A remembrance concert "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre Tuesday, the second anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as piano concerto "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il" and third movement "The General Is the Son of the Guerrillas" and fourth movement "Where Are You, Dear General?", an immortal classic masterpiece, of symphony suite "Korea, I Will Glorify Thee", an immortal classic masterpiece.
					
					 The performers highly praised immortal revolutionary life and feats of Kim Jong Il who was born as the son of guerrillas in Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of the revolution and dedicated himself to accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche for decades.
					
					 Symphony poem "Boundless Is Our Yearning", choruses and orchestras "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun" and "We Know You Only" and other numbers represented that Kim Jong Il will always be with us and profound is the trust of all the service personnel and the people in supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Orchestra "Ode to the Motherland" reflecting warm love for the socialist motherland and the ardent pledge of all the service personnel and people to dedicate themselves to the dear motherland stirred up the hearts of the audience.
					
					 Enjoying the concert were senior party, state and army officials, chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the Cabinet and armed forces organs, those who distinguished themselves in realizing the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leader and other people.
					
					 Present there on invitation were delegations of overseas compatriots, overseas Koreans, those related to the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, couples of foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and military attaches here.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet to Remember Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet to Remember Kim Jong Il
 Haeju, December 17 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held by foreign crewmen in Haeju Port on Tuesday, the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The participants laid bouquets before the full-length picture depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu in Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Hung on the front wall of the venue of the meeting were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the meeting were captains and crewmen of the Cambodian-flagged ship Ming-Chuan 1 and the Tanzanian-flagged ship Haijie.
					
					 They observed a moment's silence in humblest reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speakers said at the meeting that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the people, regarding it as his motto to believe in them as in Heaven.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il who devoted himself to realizing the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung developed in depth the Juche idea and remarkably strengthened the position of the DPRK.
					
					 He dedicated his whole life to the prosperity of the country, happiness of the people and development of the friendly relations among countries.
					
					 The idea and cause of Kim Jong Il have been successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They hoped that the Korean people would successfully carry out the behests of Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants watched a Korean documentary film.

articles.title: High Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Il in Humblest Reverence
articles.content:
High Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Il in Humblest Reverence
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK paid tribute to General Secretary Kim Jong Il in humblest reverence on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise, deeply yearning for him.
					 Service personnel, people of all social standings and schoolchildren laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of Kim Jong Il in Pyongyang and other parts of the country and made bows.
					
					 There took place meetings and concerts conveying deep reverence for him in different parts of the country.
					
					 Officials and other people in Ryanggang Province held the remembrance meeting "Shine for All Ages, the General's Exploits". The performers lauded Kim Jong Il for visiting Taehongdan County to make a new history of potato farming and name the baby to be born in a family of discharged soldiers.
					
					 Artistes of South Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces gave remembrance concerts "We Miss the Image of the Sun" and "Eternal Care of the Sun" in which they highly praised the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il who made the intense forced march till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 Workers, members of the trade unions and the women's unions, youth and students in Jagang, South Phyongan and North Hwanghae provinces at the remembrance concerts expressed the ever-deepening boundless reverence of service personnel and people for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There took place oath-taking meetings of workers, agricultural workers, members of the women's unions, youth and students across the country.

articles.title: Pyongyang in Atmosphere of Mourning Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Pyongyang in Atmosphere of Mourning Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- An atmosphere of mourning General Secretary Kim Jong Il prevails over here on Tuesday, the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 An endless stream of people with floral baskets and flowers in their hands was seen flowing to the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill. They included servicepersons, security officers and schoolchildren.
					
					 According to data available, more than 750 000 people visited the statues from 16:00 Monday till 16:00 Tuesday.
					
					 The same scenes were witnessed in other parts of the city, including Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio where the Generalissimos' statues are standing.
					
					 The visitors laid floral baskets and bouquets at the statues and made a bow.
					
					 Those visitors' faces were stamped with deep reverence for Kim Jong Il, the father of the nation who dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness, performing undying feats for the times and history.
					
					 A national memorial service was given at Pyongyang Indoor Stadium in the presence of supreme leader Kim Jong Un on the same occasion.
					
					 The service, carried live on TV channels, clearly manifested the firm will of all the servicepersons and civilians to successfully carry out the behests of Kim Jong Il for building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Meanwhile, the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun were crowded with servicepersons, working people, youth students and schoolchildren who visited there with humble reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Visitors to the on-going national art exhibition at the Korean Art Gallery were full of the resolve to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages and always remain true to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Press media are carrying on a daily basis articles, photos and documentary films on the greatness of Kim Jong Il and his Songun leadership exploits.

articles.title: DPRK Judokas Return
articles.content:
DPRK Judokas Return 
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK judokas returned home on Tuesday after participating in the 14th Asian Youth Judo Championship and the 7th Asian Junior Judo Championship held in Hainan Province, China.
					 They grabbed three gold medals, one silver medal and six bronze medals at the championships.
					
					 They were greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by Kim Pyong Sik, vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials concerned and their families.

articles.title: Papers Laud Kim Jong Il as Eternal Sun of Korean People
articles.content:
Papers Laud Kim Jong Il as Eternal Sun of Korean People 
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il is the great image of the great Paektusan nation, great power of the DPRK and eternal sun of the Korean people, papers editorially say on Tuesday, the 2nd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 Rodong Sinmun praises Kim Jong Il as an outstanding leader, peerless patriot and peerlessly great man who dedicated his all to the country and the nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career was the one of a peerlessly great man who clearly indicated the road of eternal victory to be followed by the Korean people and the one of an illustrious brilliant commander who firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country and its people with the arms of Songun, notes the editorial, adding:
					
					 His life was the one of the father of people totally dedicated to the happiness and prosperity of the generations to come.
					
					 It is the greatest exploits performed by him that he paved a wide avenue for the Korean people to win one victory after another in the new era of Juche-oriented revolution on the basis of the unitary idea and center.
					
					 The People's Army has developed into an invincible and powerful revolutionary Paektusan army and socialist Korea has turned into a world military power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and the Korean people have, accordingly, demonstrated their dignity as an independent people whom no force dare provoke. This is a brilliant fruition of the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Basing himself on the noble outlook on life "Let us live not merely for today but for tomorrow!" he performed great exploits which no other great man in the world could ever do.
					
					 As the Korean people hold high the respected Kim Jong Un at the helm of the revolution, the idea and exploits of Kim Jong Il will always shed their rays.
					
					 Minju Joson says President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the heart of all service personnel and people and the eternal sun of the great Paektusan nation, wish them a rosy future, calling on them to successfully carry out the lifelong intentions and desire of Kim Jong Il, united closer around Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: No Statute of Limitations Is Applicable to Japan's Crimes against Humanity: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No Statute of Limitations Is Applicable to Japan's Crimes against Humanity: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A book "Plucked Flower" was published in Japan recently. The book contains a true story about eight Dutch women who were forced into sexual slavery by the Japanese imperialists in Indonesia during the Second World War. 
					 The book bears witness to the history as it indicts the Japanese imperialists for their hideous crimes related to the sexual slavery enforced by the Japanese imperialists in the 20th century.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary: Those victims of the crimes are dying with the passage of time before getting neither apology nor reparation from the Japanese government even after beginning of the 21st century. This is something deplorable and resentful, indeed.
					
					 What touches off bitter resentment among the Koreans is the attitude of the Japanese authorities towards the hideous crimes related to the sexual slavery committed by Japan in the 20th century.
					
					 The Japanese authorities have run the whole gamut of gimmicks to cover up the thrice-cursed crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Craftiness and impudence may be typical of moral vulgarity peculiar to Japan.
					
					 The sexual slavery unprecedented in history and the Japanese reactionaries' attitude and stand of denying it stem from their brazen-faced way of thinking to distort the historical facts and justify their acts, bereft of humanity.
					
					 Japan claims that the above-said sexual slavery cannot be regarded as a crime as it originated from the course of the militaristic war of overseas aggression. This is the opinion and viewpoint of the island country which has lurched to the Right considering the praise of chauvinism and militarism as ethics. Japan is rushing headlong into overseas expansion, overheated with militarist hysteria.  Its ultimate goal is to repeat the Japanese imperialists' past history of aggression. This is the very reason why the stepped-up moves for Japan's militarization escalate the distortion of history.
					
					 No statute of limitations is applicable to crimes against humanity. Japan can never escape from the responsibility for its past crimes, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Persistent Suppression of Progressive Opposition Party under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Persistent Suppression of Progressive Opposition Party under Fire in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is intensifying the repressive racket against the Unified Progressive Party (UPP), an opposition party. 
					 The puppet Seoul District Prosecutor's Office claimed that it discovered an "enemy-benefiting organization" so-called June 15 wind operated by members of the party and filed a suit against its leading members, according to KBS of south Korea on Dec. 15. 
					
					 The puppet group took this action on charges that they followed the north's revolutionary line against the south, staged actions for the withdrawal of the U.S. troops and the abolition of the "Security Law", and stoked anti-U.S. sentiment in touch with higher "enemy benefiting bodies", etc. after forming an organization aimed to put an end to the division and subjugation and build a new country.
					
					 The puppet forces are more persistently resorting to the fascist suppression for eliminating the UPP at any cost despite the protest and criticism of south Koreans from all walks of life.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers' Mammoth Rally Held in Protest against Authorities' Pro-plutocrats Policy
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers' Mammoth Rally Held in Protest against Authorities' Pro-plutocrats Policy
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The railway workers union in south Korea held a rally at the plaza of Seoul railway station on Dec. 14 in protest against the puppet authorities' pro-plutocrats policy.
					 It was attended by at least 20,000 workers including unionists affiliated to the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions.
					
					 The speakers voiced strong opposition to the privatization of railway service pressed forward by the authorities.
					
					 They also demanded the authorities immediately stop the suppression of the unionists who stood against the privatization of the railway service.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Urged to Step down
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Urged to Step down
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A Korean in the U.S. demanded the resignation of the present south Korean chief executive on Dec. 7.
					 One year has passed since the fraudulent "presidential election" in which Intelligence Service (IS) and other power organs were involved, he said, adding that voices calling for the resignation of Park Geun Hye rang louder across south Korea.
					
					 The religious circle of south Korea is intensifying its actions condemning the IS's interference in the election and demanding the present chief executive step down, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Voices critical of the fraudulent election are growing stronger worldwide and fascist crackdown on anti-"government" forces has become the target of denunciation.
					
					 Nevertheless, Park is becoming desperate with witch-hunt style suppression of civic and social organizations and opposition parties and people by branding them as "forces following the north" in disregard of public mind-set.
					
					 The present chief executive is set to meet the same miserable end as that of Park Chung-Hee, he noted, urging Park Geun Hye to step down as early as possible.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held by Saitama Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held by Saitama Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the report and conclusion made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the 2013 March plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was held by the Saitama Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Dec. 5.
					 Present there were Han Tong Song, director of the Department for Publicity and Culture of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Jo Il Yon, chairperson of the Chongryon Saitama Prefectural Headquarters, and officials of Chongryon.
					
					 At the seminar, Han Tong Song said: Marshal Kim Jong Un is always reposing deep political trust in Chongryon officials.
					
					 Han called upon officials to repay the trust with loyalty and make all efforts to develop the Korean movement in Japan.
					
					 Then followed speeches on the theme of the main spirit of the historic 2013 March plenary meeting of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Meanwhile, there took place a meeting for expressing impressions on book "On the Road for Defending the Motherland".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Websites by Brazilian, Nigerian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Websites by Brazilian, Nigerian Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK, the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea separately posted on their websites the detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's letter "Let Us Usher in the Period of Great Prosperity in Construction by Thoroughly Embodying Party's Idea on Juche-based Architecture" to the participants in the great workshop for officials in the construction field on December 11.
					 The work, made public on December 8, Juche 102 (2013), clarifies that the history of construction in the DPRK is glorious one in which the DPRK brought about miracles and changes thanks to the outstanding ideas of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on architecture and their wise leadership.
					
					 It also indicates tasks and ways facing the construction field.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted a photo of Kim Jong Un on its website.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 TNT TV Broadcasting Service and internet news service Amur Infor of Russia showed scenes of Kim Jong Il's visit to the Siberian and Far Eastern regions of the Russian Federation and his revolutionary activities between December 1 and 3.
					
					 The Indonesian newspaper Suara Karya on December 10 edited an article titled "DPRK's faith".
					
					 The paper praised Kim Jong Il for making great contributions to the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence, holding high the banner of Songun, adding that he is a great man who performed tremendous exploits.
					
					 The Cambodian State Radio and "F.M.90.5" Radio praised Kim Jong Il for firmly consolidating the DPRK as a political, ideological and military power and bringing about a radical turn in the building of a thriving nation in a program titled "Eternal Chairman of the National Defence Commission" on December 4 and 5.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- There took place meetings in Bangladesh, Iran and Myanmar on December 10 and 11 to remember General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.
					 Displayed in the venues of the meetings were photos documenting the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and exploits of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display were their works and publications introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present at the meetings were officials of the Communist Party, National Socialist Party, Socialist Party and Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm and a Myanmar publishing house and masses.
					
					 Speakers including the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party praised Kim Jong Il for making immortal contributions to the global cause of independence through his matchless great idea and leadership.
					
					 They said that he will always live in the hearts of progressive mankind as he devoted himself to the people's happiness and prosperity and the global independence.
					
					 The manager of the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm said that successes achieved by the DPRK in recent years are fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He noted that the U.S. and its followers' moves against the DPRK cannot weaken the Korean people's trust in their leader.
					
					 The general director of a Myanmar publishing house said that Kim Jong Il's immortal exploits will shine forever, adding that the world does not know such a leader as him who passed away in a train while providing field guidance for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Introduced by Russian, Ethiopian Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Introduced by Russian, Ethiopian Papers
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Russian and Ethiopian papers carried special write-ups illustrated with the portraits of smiling General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The Russian newspaper Pravda Primoriya in an article titled "Steadfast defender of socialism" on December 10 said that the truth and invincibility of socialism as a science were proved thanks to energetic ideological and theoretical activities of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il wisely led the struggle for defending Korean socialism centred on the popular masses, holding high the banner of Songun, it noted.
					
					 The Russian paper Komsomolskaya Pravda on December 10 said in an article titled "Immortal banner for realizing independence in all countries of the world":
					
					 30 years have passed since Kim Jong Il published the historic work "Let Us Advance under the Banner of Marxism-Leninism and the Juche Idea" but his work is still displaying great vitality.
					
					 Epoch-making changes in the DPRK clearly prove that the Juche idea is the most scientific and correct idea to carry out the cause of socialism.
					
					 The Korean people, proud of themselves of standing in the van of the struggle to carry out the cause of socialism, are fully ready to further glorify dignified Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea with the Juche idea and Songun politics.
					
					 An Ethiopian paper on Dec. 7 introduced in an article titled "Eternal Chairman of the National Defence Commission" that Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism and established the state machinery with the NDC as its pivot. He also turned the DPRK into an invincible military power and guided the efforts to build a thriving nation, the paper added.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Brazil, Bulgaria
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Brazil, Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions were opened with due ceremonies in Brazil and Bulgaria on Dec. 5 and 6 on the occasions of the 22nd anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					 On display in the exhibitions were photos documenting exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and their works, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremonies. 
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK said that Kim Jong Il developed in depth President Kim Il Sung's idea of attaching importance to arms and military affairs as required by the changed situation and provided the invincible treasured sword in the era of independence. He also firmly defended socialism and performed great exploits for guaranteeing the rosy future of the DPRK by pursuing Songun politics, the chairman noted. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un, taking the important post of the supreme commander of the KPA, is wisely leading the army and people of the DPRK to final victory, he added. 
					
					 The mayor of Dragoman City of Bulgaria underlined the need to actively conduct diverse cultural exchanges promoting mutual understanding and friendship between the peoples of the two countries. 
					
					 Referring to Kim Il Sung's visit to Dragoman City dozens of years ago, the mayor hoped that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two peoples will grow stronger.

articles.title: Japanese Internet Paper Introduces Popular Music in DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Internet Paper Introduces Popular Music in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- The Japanese internet paper Kyodo News on Dec. 8 in an article introduced development of popular music in the DPRK. 
					 The paper said:
					
					 The DPRK is channeling efforts into developing popular music. 
					
					 The performances given by women performers and vocalists of the Moranbong Band are applauded by Koreans. 
					
					 By origin, Koreans love songs. Karaoke devices are being provided to service personnel of the units of the Korean People's Army, too. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, showed great concern for the development of music art in his lifetime.
					
					 He said that music pieces should carry contents for conducting revolutionary education of party members and other people and held that music without politics is just like a flower without scent. 
					
					 The DPRK government is faithfully inheriting the music politics of NDC Chairman Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Now the song "Ode to the Motherland" is popular in the DPRK.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por el 2o aniversario de fallecimiento de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por el 2o aniversario de fallecimiento de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar con solemnidad el dia 17 en esta capital el acto central por el 2o aniversario del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					Asistio a la ocasion el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Participaron los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de organismos, empresas, fabricas y granjas cooperativas de la capital, los familiares de martires revolucionarios, los benemeritos y trabajadores. 
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes los compatriotas en ultramar y sus delegaciones, entre otras, la de recordacion de los coreanos residentes en Japon y la de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China, los relacionados con el Dirigente, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los representantes de organizaciones internacionales, los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					Todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente. 
					
					La palabra de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC. 
					
					El orador dijo que la vida del Dirigente fue la de gran ideologo, gran politico y gran general que realizo grandes proezas sin precedentes en la historia de la nacion coreana y la politica mundial, y continuo:
					
					Con su extraordinaria prevision y energicas actividades ideo-teoricas, el Dirigente sistematizo y desarrollo globalmente la idea Juche, la del Songun, construyo el partido, el Estado y el ejercito como los gloriosos de Kim Il Sung bajo la bandera de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo y logro la unidad monolitica. 
					
					Al considerar como credo revolucionario de toda su vida, formo el EPC como ejercito revolucionario sin rival y convirtio la RPDC en potencia militar de talla mundial, de modo que se diera la garantia de eterna prosperidad nacional. 
					
					Conduciendo a toda la nacion a la lucha por la reunificacion independiente y la gran unidad nacional, abrio la era de reunificacion del 15 de junio basada en el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" e hizo inmortal aporte a la preservacion de la paz de Asia y el resto del mundo y al cumplimiento de la causa de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero. 
					
					El fue patriota sin igual, gran revolucionario y generoso padre quien se ha consagrado por la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					Durante mas de medio siglo desde que se pusiera al frente de la revolucion coreana con el gran proposito de hacer brillar a Corea, condujo a la victoria la revolucion coreana superando con la voluntad de acero y esfuerzos sobrehumanos las pruebas de toda indole. 
					
					Gracias a los esfuerzos incansables y sacrificio del Dirigente quien vestido en chaqueta modesta, estuvo siempre en el camino de visitas de orientacion sin hacer caso de intenso frio y calor canicular, se han preparado el inagotable poderio estatal y la vida digna y feliz del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Quedaran para siempre en los anales de la patria la vida revolucionaria e imperecederas proezas del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien al conducir con su genial perspicacia y probada direccion a la unica senda de victoria la revolucion y la construccion, abrio la gloriosa era de prosperidad nacional y asento la piedra angular de cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Luego, pronunciaron discursos de juramento el vicemariscal del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Jang Chol, y el presidente del CC de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, Hyon Sang Ju, en representacion del EPC, los cientificos y la clase obrera, respectivamente. 
					
					Ellos dijeron que durante los dos anos pasados, el ejercito y pueblo dieron pruebas de su gran fidelidad al Dirigente realizando la causa de eternidad del lider y estrecharon mas los lazos sanguineos con el. 
					
					Recordaron que en medio de la sagrada lucha por materializar la idea y los ideales del Dirigente, el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC, unidos compactamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, han registrado grandes saltos en la revolucion y la construccion poniendo de pleno manifiesto el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Afirmaron que brillaran para siempre como eterno patrimonio de la Corea del Sol las proezas revolucionarias del Dirigente quien bajo la bandera del Songun y con el amor por la patria y el pueblo, preparo el invencible poderio militar y la gran unidad indestructible entre el ejercito y pueblo y llevo la dignidad de la patria y la nacion al plano mas alto de la historia nacional. 
					
					Expusieron la firme decision de garantizar con armas la causa revolucionaria del Dirigente y crear incesantemente nuevos milagros y recordes de la epoca en todos los campos de construccion de la potencia economica y la potencia civilizada socialista, bajo la orientacion victoriosa del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Este dia, tuvieron lugar actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades (municipios), distritos y complejos industriales.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Palacio de Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Palacio de Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 2o aniversario del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea visito el dia 17 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan junto con Ri Sol Ju.
					Le acompanaron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Won Hong y otros miembros del organo de direccion del CC del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang, funcionarios del CC del PTC, miembros de mando de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas y funcionarios de los ministerios e instituciones centrales.
					
					El Mariscal entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Al lado de las estatuas de pie estaban instaladas las banderas del partido, la Republica y el ejercito y estaba de pie la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y el Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino.
					
					El jefe de la guardia de honor dio el saludo mediante esta guardia ante las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos.
					
					Fueron colocados ante las estatuas un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro en nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC. 
					
					El Mariscal junto con los participantes rindio homenaje a los Generalisimos ante las estatuas y se dirigio al salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il  y le rindio sublime tributo. 
					
					Y recorrio la sala de conservacion de ordenes, el hall de llanto y las salas de conservacion del auto, el carro electrico, el barco y el vagon de tren usados por el.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El  Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje que le enviara el dia 15 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					El texto sigue:
					
					Atentamente.
					
					Con motivo del 2o aniversario del fallecimiento de Su Excelencia Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio a Su Excelencia este mensaje recordando grandes proezas realizadas por el por la patria y el pueblo.
					
					El es elogiado como eterno lider por haber mantenido dedicando toda su vida la linea revolucionaria para el fortalecimiento de la RPDC.
					
					Hoy dia, el pueblo sirio acoge junto con Su Excelencia y el amistoso pueblo coreano el dia de fallecimiento de Su Excelencia Dirigente Kim Jong Il evaluando altamente sus hazanas imperecederas.
					
					Estamos satisfechos de las solidas relaciones de amistad existentes entre nuestros dos paises y dos pueblos.
					
					Sobre todo, apreciamos mucho el apoyo que brinda Su Excelencia a nuestra causa justa cuando nuestro pais se encuentra en una situacion dificil.
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi alta consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de G. Zyuganov
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de G. Zyuganov
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio un mensaje que le enviara el dia 13 el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa, G. Zyuganov.
					El texto senala como sigue:
					
					Estimado camarada Kim Jong Un,
					
					Transcurrieron 2 anos desde el dia en que fallecio el camarada Kim Jong Il, lider reconocido del pueblo coreano.
					
					Los recuerdos de el estan guardados siempre en lo profundo del corazon de los habitantes coreanos y sus legados se materializan correctamente en las labores para la patria y el bienestar del pueblo.
					
					La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea continua la construccion socialista aumentando su poderio defensivo.
					
					Los exitos logrados por el pueblo coreano son una expresion de veneracion a Kim Jong Il.
					
					Con alta consideracion.

articles.title: Concierto en memoria de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Concierto en memoria de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 17 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el Teatro Moranbong el concierto de recordacion intitulado "Kim Jong Il siempre esta vivo como el Sol" ofrecido por la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional con motivo del 2o aniversario del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					  Lo presenciaron los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros y de las instituciones de las fuerzas armadas, los funcionarios benemeritos en materializar la causa de eternidad del lider y los trabajadores.
					
					  A la ocasion fueron invitados las delegaciones e individuos de los coreanos residentes en ultramar, los relacionados con las actividades revolucionarias del Dirigente, el representante de la sucursal de Pyongyang del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista (FDNA), los matrimonios de los delegados diplomaticos y  de organizaciones internacionales de varios paises, los de los agregados militares acreditados en Corea.
					
					  En la escena se pusieron el concierto para piano "Al camarada Kim Jong Il", el tercer movimiento "El General es el hijo de la guerrilla" y el cuarto "?Donde esta el querido General?" de la suite sinfonica, "!Corea, te hare grande!", etc.
					
					  Los ejecutantes elogiaron la vida revolucionaria y hazanas inmortales del Dirigente quien nacio como hijo de la guerrilla en el Paektu, monte sagrado de la revolucion y se abnego por llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria de Juche durante decenios.
					
					  En el poema sinfonico "No tiene fin la anoranza", el coro y musica orquestal "Kim Jong Il siempre esta vivo como el Sol" y otras piezas, demostraron bien que el Dirigente estara para siempre junto con nosotros y es infinita la confianza de todos los militares y civiles en el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Conmovio a todos los espectadores la melodia solemne de la musica orquestal "Himno a la Patria" que refleja el amor a la patria socialista y el firme juramento de todo el ejercito y pueblo del pais de dedicar todo lo suyo por la patria mas preciosa que otros.
